mapper.delete: delete from ds_pes_customer_store_month where year =#{year} and month =#{month}
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO ds_pes_customer_store_month(storeno,storename,platformid,cityname,new_cusnum_ten,cusnum,cusnum_ten,year,month) SELECT ifnull(ts.storeno,'') as store_code,ts.name as store_name,c.store_id,ts.city_name,ifnull(c.new_10_count,0) as new_10_count,ifnull(c.total,0) as total,ifnull(b.total_ten,0) as total_ten,YEAR(date_sub(now(),interval 1 day)),MONTH(date_sub(now(),interval 1 day)) FROM (select d.store_code,d.store_id,d.store_name,d.store_city_name,sum(d.new_10_count) as new_10_count ,sum(d.total) as total from (select tor.store_code,tor.store_id,tor.store_name,tor.store_city_name,sum(case when customer_isnew_flag >='10' and customer_isnew_flag !='-1' then 1 else 0 end) as new_10_count ,count(DISTINCT(tor.customer_id)) as total from df_mass_order_monthly tor where tor.customer_id not like 'fakecustomer%' and tor.sign_time >=#{begindate} and tor.sign_time < DATE_ADD(DATE(#{enddate}), INTERVAL 1 DAY) and tor.eshop_name NOT LIKE '%测试%' AND tor.eshop_white!='QA' and tor.store_name NOT LIKE '%测试%' and tor.store_white!='QA' AND tor.store_status =0 group by store_id
union ALL select tor.store_code,tor.normal_store_id as store_id,tor.store_name,tor.store_city_name,sum(case when customer_isnew_flag >='10' and customer_isnew_flag !='-1' then 1 else 0 end) as new_10_count ,count(DISTINCT(tor.customer_id)) as total from df_mass_order_monthly tor where tor.customer_id not like 'fakecustomer%' and tor.sign_time >=#{begindate} and tor.sign_time < DATE_ADD(DATE(#{enddate}), INTERVAL 1 DAY) and tor.eshop_name NOT LIKE '%测试%' AND tor.eshop_white!='QA' and tor.store_name NOT LIKE '%测试%' and tor.store_white!='QA' AND tor.store_status =0 group by normal_store_id) d GROUP BY d.store_id ) c LEFT JOIN (select a.store_code,a.store_id,sum(case when a.monetary>10 then 1 else 0 end ) as total_ten from (select tor.store_code,tor.store_id,sum(IFNULL(tor.gmv_price,0)) as monetary from df_mass_order_monthly tor where tor.customer_id not like 'fakecustomer%' and tor.sign_time >=#{begindate} and tor.sign_time < DATE_ADD(DATE(#{enddate}), INTERVAL 1 DAY) and tor.eshop_name NOT LIKE '%测试%' AND tor.eshop_white!='QA' and tor.store_name NOT LIKE '%测试%' and tor.store_white!='QA' AND tor.store_status =0 group by store_id,customer_id union all select tor.store_code,tor.normal_store_id as store_id,sum(IFNULL(tor.gmv_price,0)) as monetary from df_mass_order_monthly tor where tor.customer_id not like 'fakecustomer%' and tor.sign_time >=#{begindate} and tor.sign_time < DATE_ADD(DATE(#{enddate}), INTERVAL 1 DAY) and tor.eshop_name NOT LIKE '%测试%' AND tor.eshop_white!='QA' and tor.store_name NOT LIKE '%测试%' and tor.store_white!='QA' AND tor.store_status =0 group by tor.normal_store_id,customer_id order by monetary desc) a group by store_id) b on c.store_id = b.store_id LEFT join t_store ts on c.store_id = ts.platformid
